card.name: DNA Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Scale of Bravery and Love
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Discard a card from your hand, then draw 2 cards. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

card.name: Pergaladaida, Concatenated Destruction General
card.text: ■ EX Life ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, put a creature that costs 4 or less from your graveyard.

card.name: Pergaladaida, Concatenated Destruction General
card.text: ■ EX Life ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, put a creature that costs 4 or less from your graveyard.

card.name: Bloodow-2, Rotten Saint
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature, draw a card. ■ Sasagale

card.name: Urgaan, Connected Pure Dark
card.text: ■ EX Life ■ Double Breaker ■ Untap this creature at the End Step

card.name: Bolsren Buster, Hybrid Flame Machine
card.text: ■ Guard Strike ■ EX Life ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Ldbat-1, Nightmare
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Sasagale

card.name: Bakuislay-1, Warrior
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw a card. ■ Sasagale
